Package org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper

Class API

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.API
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsynchronousAPI, SynchronousAPI
    public abstract class API
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Wrapping API implementations. Created by Philip Vendil.

    • Constructor Detail

      • API

        protected API​(java.lang.String host,
              int port,
              java.io.File trustedServerCertificate,
              java.io.File macaroonFile)
       throws javax.net.ssl.SSLException,
              ClientSideException
        Minimal constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of ldn application
        port - the port of the application.
        trustedServerCertificate - a link of the SSL certificate used by the LND Application.
        macaroonFile - the file pointing to the macaroon to use, or null if no macaroons are used.
        Throws:
        javax.net.ssl.SSLException - if problems occurred setting up the SSL Connection.
        ClientSideException - if problems occurred reading the macaroon file.

      • API

        protected API​(java.lang.String host,
              int port,
              io.grpc.netty.shaded.io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext sslContext,
              MacaroonContext macaroonContext)
        Constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application with more flexible SSL context parameters and macaroon Context.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of ldn application
        port - the port of the application.
        sslContext - the SSL Context used when connecting the LND Application.
        macaroonContext - the macaroon context to use.

      • API

        protected API​(io.grpc.ManagedChannel channel)
        Constructor used for setting up a connection using a GRPC managed channel that can be customized.
        Parameters:
        channel - the managed channel to use.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        protected void validate​(Message message)
                 throws ValidationException
        Method to validate all fields in related message and throws a validation exception with a validation report with all found validation problems.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to validate.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - exception containing a validation report with all validation problems found.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws StatusException
        Method to close underlying channel and free resources.
        Throws:
        StatusException - if problems occurred in underlying GRPC call. Can be of one of three sub exceptions
      • ClientSideException: if problems was found in the request data, such as invalid or unexpected data.
      • ServerSideException: if server side problems was detected when processing the request.
      • CommunicationException: if communication related problems occurred during the call.

      • processRequest

        protected java.lang.Object processRequest​(Message requestMessage)
                                   throws ValidationException
        Method to convert and validate (if validation is enabled) a request message to and underlying apiObject sent to LDN Server.
        Parameters:
        requestMessage - the request message to convert
        Returns:
        a converted GRPC message.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - exception containing a validation report with all validation problems found, if validation is used.

      • isPerformValidation

        public boolean isPerformValidation()
        Returns:
        returns true if send and received messages is validated.

      • setPerformValidation

        public void setPerformValidation​(boolean performValidation)
        Parameters:
        performValidation - set to true if messages should be validated before sent or received.
